::DrillBit::

He jumps to the side, the last three energy shots hitting his left leg.
He gets to a kneeling position and take aim at Ignatius. Machine guns
fire from all six of DrillBits insect legs. The shots head for Ignatius'
mid section. Also DrillBit fires two optic laser shots at Ignatius'
head.
